liveSeries.title: LiveSeries
liveSeries.description: A TV show tracking & torrent streaming service. Real-time TV show episodes, ratings, and more. Find your favourite TV shows and stay up-to-date by subscribing to automatic episode downloads.
liveSeries.explanation: In order to search for and download TV show torrents, you must set up a LiveSeries server. This server will be used to fetch torrent files and stream video content.
liveSeries.setup: Visit your profile to set up your LiveSeries server URL.
liveSeries.tvMazeCredits: This website uses data from the TVmaze API, which is licensed under CC BY-SA. We gratefully acknowledge TVmaze as the source of show data for LiveSeries.
liveSeries.tvMazeCreditsCta: For more details about TVmaze and their services, please visit

tvShow.title: Show Details
tvShow.confirmSubscribe: Are you sure you want to automatically download unwatched episodes for this show?
tvShow.markAllWatched: Mark all episodes in season as {un}watched

search.title: Search
search.label: Search TV Shows
search.prompt: What would you like to watch?
search.noResults: Your query returned no results. Try searching for something else.

home.title: Home
home.noLikes:
Welcome to LiveSeries! To get started, find a show to watch. 
Use the search bar to find your favourite TV shows, or explore the most popular ones. 
Once you find a show you like, click the heart icon to add it to your liked shows—you will then find it here!
home.login: You must be logged in to use that function.

episodes.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {episode} from the server?

watch.playbackError: There was a problem playing that video. Please try again later.

websockets.connectionFailed: Could not establish a connection with the websocket. Ensure the LiveSeries server URL is configured correctly and try again later.
websockets.error: An unknown error occured during websocket communication. Try again later.
websockets.askReconnect: The websocket connection with the LiveSeries server was forcefully closed. Reconnect?
